name: dA: Rainbow Llama
description:
Adds an extra badge to every profile and group you see.

Credit to ginkgografix for the original code.

This has been made with permission from her.

Find the original userscript here: http://fav.me/d2mw8a8

See it on dA here: http://wintercool612.deviantart.com/art/Screenshot-badges-of-deviantart-deviantart-com-201-694256112

user.name: Kaius Coolman
user.about: The Styles I have Recommend Are: Quiet Facebook (official) For tumblr: Dave Strider Logo Terezi Mind Aspect Back To Top Button Legend of Korra: Chief of Police Dash/Home Icon Baby Dave Clings To Every Dashboard Post Tumblr Icon Top hats For deviantART: 2015 Username Symbols DeviantART dA: Pink Glitter Llama Badge deviantART cleanup DeviantArt-v7 Awesome Notes Pizza Badge Leaf symbol for deviantART non-premium members dA: Movember dA: Let it snow deviantART: snowy gruser v7 (rotane) dA: hide this external-link arrow!
